item.title: Knight Online Kurian Macro Guide - Two Powerful Combos with Kozy Macro
item.description: In Knight Online, the Kurian character stands out with both poisonous attacks and powerful physical combos as a unique class. Using the right combo is vital to unleash Kurian’s true potential. Kozy Macro’s Kurian feature offers you two different combo options: Smash (Poison) Combo and 75-63-60 Attack Combo. What is Kurian Macro? Knight Online Kurian macro is an advanced combo system that supports this character’s two different playstyles. You can determine which combo to use in which situation and achieve maximum efficiency.
